metadata.title: CVE-2018-10898 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in openstack-tripleo-heat-templates beforeversion 8.0.2-40. When deployed using Director using default configuration,Opendaylight in RHOSP13 is configured with easily guessable defaultcredentials.

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
